page.title: 12Health Worker (work/leisure)
page.content: Mrs Brooks is a Health Visitor living in Barrowby. She works for a group of doctors in Grantham. In her job she visits all the children after they are born until they are 4\ years old to see that they are growing and developing as they should. In her spare time she plays badminton, golf and swims and she has swum a mile to raise money for Barrowby Church. In the winter she sings in the Grantham Choral Society. As she used to be a nurse, she takes the Cubs for their First Aid badge.
